name: budgeteer-mcp-agent
description: Travel budgeting and cost estimation MCP server for trip planning

tools.name: calculate_trip_budget
tools.description: Calculate comprehensive trip budget including planned costs and daily spending estimates

trip_plan.description: Complete trip plan with components, dates, budget, and traveler count

daily_spend_estimates.description: Daily spending estimates per category per person

additional_costs.description: Optional additional costs not included in main trip plan

demo.description: Whether to use demo data for testing

returns.description: Budget calculation with breakdown by category, status, and surplus/shortfall analysis

tools.name: suggest_budget_swaps
tools.description: Suggest budget-friendly alternatives for trip components with cost savings and risk analysis

trip_plan.description: Current trip plan to analyze for budget optimization

target_categories.description: Specific travel categories to focus on for suggestions

max_risk_level.description: Maximum acceptable risk level for alternative suggestions

min_savings_threshold.description: Minimum cost savings required to suggest alternatives

demo.description: Whether to use demo data for testing

returns.description: List of budget swap suggestions with cost savings, risk analysis, and constraint violations

tools.name: get_demo_trip_plan
tools.description: Get a demo trip plan for testing and development purposes

returns.description: Sample trip plan with realistic components and costs

tools.name: get_demo_daily_spend_estimates
tools.description: Get demo daily spend estimates for testing and development purposes

returns.description: Sample daily spending estimates by travel category
